function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of clear SOP for workforce management","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases in the workplace","Mitigation":"Establish clear and effective SOP for workforce management and compliance","Technologies":"Access control systems, digital monitoring tools, and communication technologies","People":"Workers, employees, and labor at project sites","Owner":"Government, project management, and site supervisors"},{"Description":"Seriousness of the COVID-19 outbreak","Impact":"Prolonged movement control and lockdown measures, increased exposure to positive cases","Mitigation":"Effective government control measures, rapid response to outbreak situations, and implementation of policies to stop virus spreading","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, testing and surveillance technologies, and real-time data analytics","People":"General public, workers, and employees","Owner":"Government and public health authorities"}]}
